DOC.brief_summary: This study study labor epidural analgesia compare dilute ( 0.0625 % ) concentrate ( 0.25 % ) bupivacaine . We hypothesize patient randomize receive concentrate drug require drug , profound motor block , likely require instrumental delivery less satisfied receive dilute epidural drug .
DOC.brief_title: Dilute Versus Concentrated Epidural Bupivacaine Labor
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine effect two different local anesthetic concentration use epidural analgesia labor . Patients randomize receive epidural bupivacaine , either concentrate ( 0.25 % ) , dilute ( 0.0625 % ) solution , administer patient-controlled epidural analgesia ( PCEA ) .
DOC.criteria: nulliparity , active spontaneous labor , cervical dilatation great 2cm less 5 cm , request epidural analgesia , age 18 40 , American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical status I II , body weight less 110kg , gestational age great 36 complete week , singelton pregnancy vertex presentation narcotic administration previous 3 hour , nonreassuring fetal heart rate tracing stage labor prior enrollment , previous uterine surgery , preeclampsia inability adequately understand consent process .
